<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sysauto_script">
    <sysauto_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <active>true</active>
        <business_calendar/>
        <condition/>
        <conditional>false</conditional>
        <entered_time>1970-01-01 00:00:00</entered_time>
        <name>Delete stale Health Events</name>
        <run_as display_value="Mike Moody">831257811b2450100cd4c91b1e4bcbf3</run_as>
        <run_as_tz/>
        <run_dayofmonth>1</run_dayofmonth>
        <run_dayofweek>1</run_dayofweek>
        <run_period>1970-01-01 00:00:05</run_period>
        <run_start>2020-05-02 09:58:23</run_start>
        <run_time>1970-01-01 08:00:00</run_time>
        <run_type>periodically</run_type>
        <script><![CDATA[deleteEvents();
function deleteEvents() {
    // sys_created_onBETWEENjavascript:gs.dateGenerate('2020-05-02','03:00:00')@javascript:gs.dateGenerate('2020-05-02','03:00:05')^name=x_snc_health_monit.patient_details
    //sys_created_onBETWEENjavascript:gs.dateGenerate('2020-05-02','03:00:00')@javascript:gs.dateGenerate('2020-05-02','03:00:05')^name=x_snc_health_monit.patient_details
    // queue=no_process^sys_created_on<javascript:gs.dateGenerate('2020-05-02','03:15:00')
    var nowGDT = new GlideDateTime();
    nowGDT.addSeconds(-10);
    var nowString = nowGDT.getDisplayValue();
    var nowDate = String(nowString).split(" ")[0];
    var nowTime = String(nowString).split(" ")[1];
    /*
    nowGDT.addSeconds(5);
    var thenString = nowGDT.getDisplayValue();
    var thenDate = String(thenString).split(" ")[0];
    var thenTime = String(thenString).split(" ")[1];
    var query = "sys_created_onBETWEENjavascript:gs.dateGenerate('" + nowDate + "','" + nowTime + "')@javascript:gs.dateGenerate('" + thenDate + "','" + thenTime + "')^queue=no_process";
    gs.debug(query);
    */
    var query = "queue=no_process^sys_created_on<javascript:gs.dateGenerate('" + nowDate + "','" + nowTime + "')";
	gs.debug(query);
    var gr = new GlideRecord("sysevent");
    gr.addEncodedQuery(query);
    gr.deleteMultiple();
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sysauto_script</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>mmoody</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2020-05-02 10:20:53</sys_created_on>

        <sys_name>Delete stale Health Events</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sysauto_script_03bc31911b6c50100cd4c91b1e4bcb62</sys_update_name>

        <sys_updated_on>2020-05-02 10:24:40</sys_updated_on>
        <time_zone/>
        <upgrade_safe>false</upgrade_safe>
    </sysauto_script>
</record_update>
